channel.title: Plat en Sauce on

item.title: Plat en Sauce Abstraction
item.description: Hi all! Here is my first post on food! I hope you enjoy it and am looking forward to your comments! Today, I’ll focus on the French Plat en sauce concept. I found an old cooking book in one of my parents’ shelves a few months ago and finally got around to checking it out and trying some things in it. The book is called Le Répertoire de la Cuisine (1914 for the first edition) by Théodore Gringoire and Louis Saulnier.
